title: Suspensions and Banning
body:
The banning and suspensions have just gone too far. Back in the days it would be just a day or two suspension for leaving at least 2 to 3 games. Now-a-days you say a single curse word at a team mate and you get a fortnight ban! Which is outrageous, Also riot promoting videos like the stick spotlight just promoting bad behaviour and BMing just forcing people to go on tilt. Why should we pay for retaliating to someone offending us?
We are just getting banned for the simplest things, the rules now are just way too tight.

replies.body:
It wasn't a single curse word. When you received the ban it would have give you a chat log of the game, if you want to post it here we can go through it.

I had a look at the game, you're abusing your team mates pretty much the entire time, as well as using homophobic and racist terms. You're also issuing real life threats and making inappropriate references to other player's families.

I would use the 2 weeks you are banned for to think about ways you can be calmer in your games and respectful to other players otherwise you'll be facing a permanent ban.

SUCKED IN FOR GETTING BANNED!!!!!

ABOUT TIME RIOT DID SOMETHING ABOUT PEOPLE LIKE YOU!

AGAIN, SUCKED IN AND ENJOY YOUR 2 WEEK BAN, WHEN YOU COME BACK I DARE YOU TO TROLL MORE SO YOU CAN GET PERMA BAN!

HAHAHAHAHAHAAHAH!

I'm done with league I been playing for a little over a year now I have put in probably a few 100 $ and now with out any warnings or temp bans or anything I get perma banned out of nowhere for 1 game where I got a little mad and called me team shit ... Witch if a WAY TO FUCKING BIG punishment over something so small
